DOC.brief_summary: TELEDIAB-1 national , multicenter , control , randomise trial . The Primary objective TELEDIAB-1 study demonstrate PDA-FIT system ( PDA-Phone and/or telemonitoring ) able improve metabolic control chronically uncontrolled type 1 diabetic patient , despite intensive insulin therapy ( multiple daily injection basal-bolus insulin insulin pump ) , compare conventional care . Main judgment criterion : comparison HbA1c mean 3 group 6 month
